name: comet-collections-extension
description: A powerful Microsoft Edge Collections clone for Chrome browsers

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp -r . dist/ && rm -rf dist/node_modules dist/.git dist/package*.json
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../comet-collections-v$npm_package_version.zip . -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' 'package*.json'
scripts.version-patch: npm version patch && npm run package
scripts.version-minor: npm version minor && npm run package
scripts.version-major: npm version major && npm run package
scripts.dev: echo 'Load unpacked extension in Chrome for development'

author: Den Quizon
